column5: Anyone been there? Any info would be helpful? Good/Bad anyone, buler?

I've been trying to get a search address but it won't hold in the post so- - - - Click on the search button above and enter L'Oasis du Gouin - there is quite a good deal of info there.Since my trips the place is under new ownership and I've heard some positive things aboat them.If you have further questions you can PM me if you like.McQ
